title: Full Send
description: A VACATION IN THE MOUNTAINS WITH FRIENDS IS EXACTLY WHAT I NEED...Visiting my home away from home, my family ski condo in Jackson, Wyoming, for a much needed break from my soul crushing corporate career. Time to clear my mind in the crisp cool mountain air should be just what I need to reevaluate my career, my goals, and my life. Except for one little thing… well maybe not so little.My brother's best friend, Tanner Chapman, a born and raised local, and mountain of a man himself, is waiting to see us and seems to have different plans for us this time. It's been years since I've seen him and he's not my brother's lanky, goofy sidekick anymore. The adventurous, calm and confident diehard skier has grown into something much, much more.Despite the cold temperatures, things are heating up with Tanner and I know I'm playing with fire for even entertaining a fling with him, but that might be just what I need…
author: Dakota Forest
